answers.answer: Many babes turn between 31 and due date.  You can look up spinning babies,  sometimes chiropractor can help baby turn as well our drs can also.
Thanks. I have been yold my doctor wont do it for me as i have gdm. Sure ill look for othwr options.

Well controlled diabetes should not have implications for your baby.  How are you going now? Has the baby turned yet?  Do try a chiropractor.When I was pregnant about 30 weeks, my baby was still head up.  I went to a cranialsacral therapist.  She turned the baby.  She had her hands on my head and next thing I felt something with the baby, and said oh what happened.  She replied that she had just turned the baby for me.  Sure enough baby was then head down and stayed that way.  Sounds unbelievable, but it happened.
My baby keep changing posiuons evwry now and then. Yes my diabetes is well controlled wothin the rane with exercises and diet. Ill meet a chiropractor asap. Thanks for the response. Love <3

question: Anyone having breech baby and gestational  diabetes. I am 31 weeks now and i am worried about not having natural birth. Hope he turns to the right position soon. Fingers crossed.
title: GDM and breech baby
